Decision: adds the BYT_TRIG_LVL flag to this

Decision: making the ACPI button driver loadable as a module even if not booted in ACPI mode
Rationale: to fix the asymmetry and provide the acpi_lid_open() symbol

Decision: It breaks docking stations basically

Decision: assume the user will use the internal keyboard before this timeout expires
Rationale: logind only checks the lid switch value after a timeout

Decision: This will allow us to simplify the GPE handling code quite a bit
Rationale: that change is too intrusive for 2.6.35
